name: Ai To Noroi
description:
This is a story about 6 girls, very close friends, which were fond of mythical and demonic mysteries. One day they went into an old book store, and found a very old book. Despite it was incredibly expensive, they bought it. Then, one of the girls was chosen to keep the book at home. Serious consequences followed...

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Run: Shift
  • Inventory: 1, 2
  • Hide UI: Ctrl + H
  • Take a screenshot: Ctrl + S

Warning:

Ai To Noroi is in early development. You might experience bugs, lack of content and even freezes and crashes, so if you experience a bug, we would be very glad to see your report, it will help to make the game much more better!
Note: This game doesn't have an ending yet😞

Feel free to join our Discord channel! There, you can stay tuned for new updates, interact with other people, send your arts, report bugs and much more else!
